argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lsmval.v | |- B = ( Base ` G ) |
| 2 |  | lsmval.a | |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) |
| 3 |  | lsmval.p | |- .(+) = ( LSSum ` G ) |
| 4 |  | #P_subgrcl | |- ( T e. ( SubGrp ` G ) -> G e. Grp ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( T e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ U e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) -> G e. Grp ) |
| 6 | 1 | #P_subgss | |- ( T e. ( SubGrp ` G ) -> T C_ B ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( T e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ U e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) -> T C_ B ) |
| 8 | 1 | #P_subgss | |- ( U e. ( SubGrp ` G ) -> U C_ B ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( T e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ U e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) -> U C_ B ) |
| 10 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_lsmvalx | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ T C_ B /\ U C_ B ) -> ( T .(+) U ) = ran ( x e. T , y e. U |-> ( x .+ y ) ) ) |
| 11 | 5, 7, 9, 10 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( T e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ U e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) -> ( T .(+) U ) = ran ( x e. T , y e. U |-> ( x .+ y ) ) ) |
